title: Petition/Discussion for in-game voice chat
body:
**This would promote more effective communication among teams:**

- You wouldn't have to take your hands off your useful buttons to type, and no more accidental Summoner spell pops because you didn't hit Enter properly.
- Less salt and toxicity, in my opinion it is much easier to type abuse than it is to verbally say it to another human.
- Premades no longer have the advantage over the enemy team of having voice comms.
- People can verbally MIA!!!!!!!!!
- It's 2015. VOIP has been out for a while now Riot...

**On a sidenote:**
 In my opinion, it's pretty rich to offer a VOIP service to your LCS players while they're hitting the bigtime, but not have one embedded in the game that the rest of your community plays.

**TL,DR: Bump if you want VOIP in-game. Also post your pros and cons in the comments.**
